note: The prevalence of diarrhea may vary by season. Since surveys are administered at different times, data should be compared with caution.
title: Share of children with diarrhea receiving treatment
subtitle: The share of children under five years old with diarrhea, in the two weeks prior to the survey, who received either [oral rehydration therapy](#dod:oral-rehydration-therapy) or increased fluids, whilst feeding continues.

display.name: Diarrhea treatment (% of children under five receiving oral rehydration and continued feeding)
display.unit: % of children under five receiving treatment
